title: FS/FT: Bunch of 150 trimmed cards.....cheap.  ALL SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Bunch of 150 trimmed cards.....cheap.  ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
I have a large lot of trimmed 150's I'm looking to move. These were part of a big lot I bought a little while back that were previously cut away from a scrapbook.  These were soaked to remove the cardstock they were attached to......as you can see, most have complete backs.
 
I'm asking $$$for Tenney and Merkle......otherwise I'm looking for $$$ a card. 
 
For 5 or more cards, I can discount $1 a card.
 
Shipping will be $2 regardless of how many cards you want.  Payment by PP Friends/Family or by money order (will ship on receipt of payment). 

I also have a different bunch on ebay still and have a group of around 20 HOFer's as well as a Lundgren Cubs.  PM me with any questions or scan requests.
 
Thanks for looking!
